main event: On December 31, 1966, an observer sighted and photographed two slightly glowing objects in New Carlisle, Indiana.
interesting points: The two glowing objects were reported to appear when the street light should have already been illuminated., The observer classified the report as confused., The sighting lasted for several minutes during which the objects hovered and moved., The objects displayed variable intensity illumination., Information about local weather conditions was also included in the report.
witness description: The witness provided an estimate of the objects above the horizon and indicated their behavior in the sky.
